## rds-flex-item Readme



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


### Properties

| Property     | Attribute     | Description                                                                                                                                                       | Type                                                                                      | Default     |
| ------------ | ------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `alignSelf`  | `align-self`  | Overrides a flex item's alignItems value on the cross-axis.                                                                                                       | `"auto" , "baseline" , "center" , "flex-end" , "flex-start" , "stretch" , string[]` | `undefined` |
| `flexBasis`  | `flex-basis`  | Sets the initial main size of a flex item. Can be a pixel value or percentage.                                                                                    | `string , string[]`                                                                      | `undefined` |
| `flexGrow`   | `flex-grow`   | Sets the flex grow factor of a flex item's main size.                                                                                                             | `string , string[]`                                                                      | `undefined` |
| `flexShrink` | `flex-shrink` | Sets the flex shrink factor of a flex item. If the size of all flex items is larger than the flex container, items shrink to fit according to this prop.          | `string , string[]`                                                                      | `undefined` |
| `order`      | `order`       | Sets the order to lay out an item in a flex or grid container. Items in a flex component are sorted by ascending order value and then by their source code order. | `string , string[]`                                                                      | `undefined` |


### Slots

| Slot | Description                                                |
| ---- | ---------------------------------------------------------- |
|      | Used to add components/elements into a flex child element. |
